Uses of Class
site.mtnsj.protocols.payments.PaymentProtocol.Ack

  • Packages that use PaymentProtocol.Ack 
    Package Description
    site.mtnsj.protocols.payments
    The BIP70 payment protocol wraps Bitcoin transactions and adds various useful features like memos, refund addresses and authentication.

    • Uses of PaymentProtocol.Ack in site.mtnsj.protocols.payments
